mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MALL( MALL_NAME, MALL_COMMITSSION_CAL, DATA_START_CAL, MALL_REGIST_DATE, ORCU_NAME_CAL, ORCU_ID_CAL, ORCU_PHONENUMBER_CAL, ORDER_NUMBER_CAL, ORDER_CODE_CAL, PAYMENT_DATE_CAL, PAYMENT_METHOD_CAL, DELIVERY_METHOD_CAL, SHOPPING_CHARGE_CAL, DELIVERY_MESSAGE_CAL, BUY_DATE_CAL, SHIPPING_DATE_CAL, PRODUCT_NUMBER_CAL, PRODUCT_NAME_CAL, PRODUCT_OPTION_CAL, PRODUCT_ADD_CAL, PRODUCT_PRICE_CAL, PRODUCT_QTY_CAL, RECU_NAME_CAL, RECU_PHONENUMBER_CAL, RECU_HOMENUMBER_CAL, RECU_ZIPCODE_CAL, RECU_ADDRESS_CAL, USER_NO, ORDER_TOTAL_AMOUNT_CAL ) VALUES ( #{mallName}, #{mallCommitssionCal}, #{dataStartCal}, #{mallRegistDate}, #{orcuNameCal}, #{orcuIdCal}, #{orcuPhoneNumberCal}, #{orderNumberCal}, #{orderCodeCal}, #{paymentDateCal}, #{paymentMethodCal}, #{deliveryMethodCal}, #{shoppingChargeCal}, #{deliveryMessageCal}, #{buyDateCal}, #{shippingDateCal}, #{productNumberCal}, #{productNameCal}, #{productOptionCal}, #{productAddCal}, #{productPriceCal}, #{productQtyCal}, #{recuNameCal}, #{recuPhoneNumberCal}, #{recuHomeNumberCal}, #{recuZipCodeCal}, #{recuAddressCal}, #{userNo}, #{orderTotalAmountCal} )
